description:
Big walls or big mountains, these hiking shoes are maneuverable and supportive for hard approaches or kilometers under load. The full-length lacing system lets you tune performance for the terrain. A full rand provides durability and grip should you need to jam. The stable midsole supports your feet and ankles in rough terrain, and the sole provides traction on loose surfaces or scrambles.

  • Soft and light suede uppers with Hydrobloc® finish for water-restance and durability
  • Gore-Tex® Extended Comfort waterproof-breathable membrane
  • Padded collar adds comfort
  • To-the-toe lacing for a custom, technical fit when climbing or hiking
  • RRS rand reinforcement around entire shoe for durability in high-wear areas
  • Lightweight dual-density EVA midsole adds cushion underfoot
  • Vibram® Pepe outsole with MegaGrip rubber for grip on trails or rock
name: Zamberlan 215 Salathe Gore-Tex RR Hiking Shoes - Men's
